definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Eg. 1345 kilograms force was applied at the center point of the bar.
sentences.chinese: 试验时，在杆的中点加了1345公斤力。

sentences.english: 1345 kilograms force was applied at the center point of the bar.
sentences.chinese: 试验时，在杆的中点加了1345公斤力。

sentences.english: The details page for a university when you click on it from the overview.
sentences.chinese: 这是你从综览中点开的一个大学的细节介绍。

sentences.english: We are near the mid-point in the countdown to 2015.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在已接近2015年倒计时的中点。

sentences.english: On one occasion in a restaurant he ordered a steak tartare.
sentences.chinese: 有一次他在一个餐馆中点了一份牛排。

sentences.english: On the old boys' network, he had become a central node.
sentences.chinese: 他变成老同学关系网的中点。

sentences.english: Above the knee, in the depression of the midpoint of the superior patellar border.
sentences.chinese: 在膝上部，髌底的中点上方凹陷处。

sentences.english: The other end of the second flow limiting tube connects with the midpoint shunt valve.
sentences.chinese: 第二限流管的另一端与中点分流阀连接。

sentences.english: A transverse fracture was produced at the middle of the patella.
sentences.chinese: 于髌骨纵向中点横形锯开，造成横形骨折。

sentences.english: Distribution of first fitting points on hyperplane is derived in the diffusion process.
sentences.chinese: 求出了一类扩散过程关于超平面的首中点分布。

sentences.english: There cannot be dashes next to periods in the name.
sentences.chinese: 在名称中点号的旁边不能有连字符。

sentences.english: Join the mid-points on each side of the square to get the Kundli figure.
sentences.chinese: 连接正方形每条边的中点就可以得到坤德里图。

sentences.english: Without this the two chambers would balance out in mid-stroke.
sentences.chinese: 没有这两个闸室，就不能为冲程中点起平衡作用。

sentences.english: The middle is place of the neutral.
sentences.chinese: 在天平的中点是所谓的“中性点”。

definition: starting point or ending point (in stories etc)/end point (math)
electrical lead/connecting line/(Tw) to connect (to a network, device etc)/to go online/connection/(congressional) caucus
